module.name: Call Forward
module.changelog: *17.0.1.7* Fixing Github #550 Callforward ucp widget issue *17.0.1.1 Packaging of ver 17.0.1.1 *17.0.1alpha* 17.0.1 alpha release
module.description: The Call Forwarding module provides feature codes for call forwarding. Call Forwarding is used to forward calls from one user to another based on conditions such as busy, unavailable, and no answer.
